seo.title: RENAPROV FINANCE S.A - Trusted Microfinance in Cameroon
seo.description: RENAPROV FINANCE S.A - Microfinance institution in Cameroon. Accessible financial services, savings, loans, financial inclusion. Become a homeowner with MASO, save with ORA.
seo.keywords: microfinance, Cameroon, savings, credit, financial inclusion, RENAPROV, MASO, ORA, current account, savings account, finance, Yaoundé, Douala

slide1.title: Welcome to RENAPROV FINANCE S.A
slide1.description: ORA Academic, School, Housing, Equipment... Prepare your ambitions! Whether you are an employee, retiree, entrepreneur, merchant or student, RENAPROV FINANCE S.A offers you a range of products tailored to your needs.

slide2.title: A simple and secure account, accessible to everyone
slide2.description: At RENAPROV, open an account in minutes and enjoy services tailored to your daily life: deposits, withdrawals, transfers and savings, wherever you are.

slide3.title: MASO
slide3.description: MASO (Mutual Assistance and Solidarity) is a solidarity product set up by RENAPROV FINANCE SA that allows you to cover basic social needs.

slide4.title: Grow your projects, we finance your ambitions
slide4.description: Enjoy a complete range of banking services designed to simplify your daily financial life.

slide5.title: Visit our branch
slide5.description: Our teams welcome you in all our branches to advise you and help you achieve your financial goals.

slide6.title: Join us
slide6.description: Be part of the RENAPROV community and enjoy a strong network that supports your ambitions. Whether you are an entrepreneur, employee or student.

offer1.title: Become the owner of your future Villa with MASO!
offer1.subtitle: Registrations open until June 29. Don't miss this opportunity.

offer2.title: Save with ORA for your future projects
offer2.subtitle: ORA Academic, School, Housing, Equipment... Prepare your ambitions!

offer3.title: Open your RENAPROV account in minutes
offer3.subtitle: Current account, savings, SPMC, Bicard... All our services at your fingertips!

offer4.title: Join our network of branches throughout Cameroon
offer4.subtitle: More than 30 branches to support you in your financial projects.

solutions.title: Our financial solutions for
solutions.subtitle: Whether you are an employee, entrepreneur, merchant or student, RENAPROV offers you a range of products designed for your needs

currentAccountIndividual.title: Individual current account
currentAccountIndividual.description: Manage your daily transactions with ease.

currentAccountBusiness.title: Business current account
currentAccountBusiness.description: Manage your business transactions with ease.

currentAccountAssociation.title: Association current account
currentAccountAssociation.description: Bank account for non-profit associations (cultural, sports, religious, humanitarian, etc.).

savingsAccountIndividual.title: Individual savings account
savingsAccountIndividual.description: Save for your personal projects with preferential interest rates and simplified management.

savingsAccountBusiness.title: Business savings account
savingsAccountBusiness.description: Save for your business projects with dedicated benefits.

employeeAccount.title: Public or Private sector employee account
employeeAccount.description: Account dedicated to employees with benefits and privileged services.

pensionAccount.title: Public or Private sector pensioner account
pensionAccount.description: Account for public or private sector retirees with dedicated benefits and adapted services.

oraFoncier.title: ORA Land
oraFoncier.description: Savings plan to acquire a serviced, secure land with water and electricity, with a land title at a lower cost.

oraInvestissement.title: ORA Investment
oraInvestissement.description: Savings plan to build a fund for project implementation.

oraPrevoyance.title: ORA Provident
oraPrevoyance.description: Savings plan to build a fund to prevent happy or unfortunate events.

oraScolaire.title: ORA School
oraScolaire.description: Savings plan from 350 FCFA to guarantee the start of the school year.

oraAcademique.title: ORA Academic
oraAcademique.description: Savings plan from 1000 FCFA to cover tuition fees at BISSAÏ University Institute.

oraEquipement.title: ORA Equipment
oraEquipement.description: Savings plan for the acquisition of furniture, computer, electronic, household appliances, etc.

oraIslamique.title: ORA Islamic
oraIslamique.description: Savings plan to build a non-remunerated savings compliant with Sharia.

oraSante.title: ORA Health
oraSante.description: Savings plan to benefit from 1000 FCFA/day health coverage at La MAMU Hospital Complex.

maso.title: MASO
maso.description: MASO (Mutual Assistance and Solidarity) is a solidarity product set up by RENAPROV FINANCE SA that allows you to cover basic social needs.

spmc.title: SPMC
spmc.description: Current account adapted to small trades and small traders with simplified management fees and possibility of credit granting.

bicard.title: Bicard
bicard.description: Bank card that facilitates your financial transactions.

experience.description: Since its creation, RENAPROV FINANCE S.A has managed to gain the trust of thousands of people around the world and specifically in Cameroon through its distinctive brand which is the Solidarity Economy.

bullets.bullet1: With its extensive network across the entire Cameroonian territory with more than 28 Branches
bullets.bullet3: MASO Lottery: Win houses, motorcycles, funding…

item1.title: Manage your money at your own pace
item1.description: Make your deposits and withdrawals whenever you want, without constraints, for total control of your finances.

item2.title: Enjoy advantageous financial services
item2.description: As a RENAPROV client, you have access to exclusive offers and programs that boost your purchasing power and your projects.

item3.title: Total transparency
item3.description: Opening an account is simple and affordable, with transparent fees adapted to all budgets.

item4.title: Financial support that follows you
item4.description: Our advisors guide you in your financial decisions and help you optimize your money on a daily basis.

hospital.title: La MAMU Hospital Complex
hospital.description: A modern health facility offering quality and accessible care to all.

university.title: Bissai University Institute
university.description: An academic center dedicated to quality training and excellence.

realEstate.title: La Socagi
realEstate.description: Management and investment company that supports economic development through adapted financial solutions.

radio.title: Royal FM
radio.description: Management and investment company that supports economic development through adapted financial solutions.

newsletter.title: Subscribe to the newsletter
newsletter.description: Receive our news directly by email.

maso.title: MASO: Solidarity, assistance and opportunities for all
maso.description: RENAPROV FINANCE S.A's MASO helps Cameroonians break out of the vicious circle of poverty by providing access to essential social services and unique opportunities.
maso.benefit1: Education – Up to 20% discount on your fees
maso.benefit2: Health – Up to 35% discount on your fees
maso.benefit3: Lottery & community – Win houses, motorcycles and funding while participating in a solidarity community

ora.title: ORA: Save today, realize your projects tomorrow
ora.description: ORA is RENAPROV FINANCE S.A's savings plan that allows you to prepare your personal and professional projects with security and flexibility.
ora.benefit1: Multiple objectives – savings for land, studies, business or equipment
ora.benefit2: Security and returns – your funds are secured and grow according to your plan
